comment.body:
I have added rules to fix adblock detection in the video player and ad at the top, filters update should be available in 1-2 hours.

<hr>

@DandelionSprout Could you please take a look?
It seems that almost all images are blocked by this rule (from `Dandelion Sprout's Nordic Filters`):
```adblock
||feltet.dk/octo_cms/files/Feltet.dk//$image
```
